itunes:title: Listen to this if you are going through a breakup
title: Listen to this if you are going through a breakup
itunes:author: Joey Kidney
description:
Breakups hurt so much because you once envisioned a whole entire life with someone to the point where you lost who you are without them. And that is usually why couples tend to distance themselves because one partner loses who they are and become dependant on the other. And once the weight becomes too heavy, someone has to break. 



Support this podcast at — https://redcircle.com/the-happy-times/exclusive-content
